trans-unit.source: Defines the polling modes for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
The SelectMode enumeration defines the polling modes that can be passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: SelectMode 列舉會定義可以傳遞至輪詢模式<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectRead value to determine if a listening <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> has incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectRead 值來判斷如果接聽<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>具有連入連線要求。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectWrite value to determine if a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is writeable.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否使用 SelectWrite 值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>是可寫入。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectError value to determine if there is an error condition present on the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 用於判斷是否有錯誤狀況存在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> SelectError 值

trans-unit.source: For explanations of writeability, readability, and the presence of error conditions, see the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需 writeability 可讀性及是否存在的錯誤狀況的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
